captions.text: I close my eyes and getting warm

Just like your hug
Just like your lips
It really feels like our story

This scent is...
The two of us in the car
Would you listen to the song?

(Like U)

It's so good. It's so good
(Woo)

(Like U)

It's so good. It's so good
(Woo)

This song is... The lyrics are..
(Like U)

It's so good. It's so good
(Uhm)

This song is...
This song is...

This scent is...

a story of all of us

This song is... The lyrics are...
(Like U)

It's so good. It's so good
(Woo)
The story only the two of us know
Would you listen to this song?
The story only the two of us know

Thanks to your participation,
we made a heartwarming music video.

Best whises to you, nice guys.
Thank you and love you. - from LYn -

I remember watching this music video months ago,and feeling so lonely and 
sad.~ :(
I even cried because I was so sad..~ :( :( :(  I was jealous of the 
happy,cute couples.~ >.< But I was happy for them at the same time.~ ^.^ 
They are very cute couples~! ^.^
But now,I'm not jealous anymore.~ ^.^ I have someone I will cherish 
forever.~ :) :)
Enjoy this cute music video~! ^.^
AND~!! Lyn's sweet,beautiful,AMAZING,voice~!! >w<
I <3 Lyn~~ ^^﻿
